parameter.description:
MODE1, Example: change saturation level from 0% to 99%
Parameter 9: Step = 5

parameter.name: config_10_2

parameter.description:
Time between steps (relevant for MODE1).

Available settings: 1 - 60000 ms.

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Time for changing from start to end value
parameter.description:
Step value (relevant for MODE1).
Default setting: 67 (3s)
0: immediate change
1-63: 20-126 [ms] value*20ms
65-127: 1-63 [s] (value-64)*1s
129-191: 10-630 [s] (value-128)*10s
193-255: 1-63 [min] (value-192)*1min

Maximum Brightening level.

parameter.name: config_13_1

parameter.name: config_14_2
parameter.label: 14: Inputs/Outputs configuration - relevant for main controllers other than Home Center 2 only
parameter.description:
Inputs/Outputs configuration - relevant for main controllers other than Home Center 2 only.
Default setting: 4369
Controlled device: RGBW, toggle switch inputs (NORMAL MODE).
Each 4bit refer to given IN/OUT (channel) settings.
The maximum level cannot be lower than minimum level.

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: Remember device status after power failure
parameter.description:
Define how will the Plug react after the power supply is back on.
Default setting: 1
Available settings:
0 - Device does not memorize its state after a power failure. Connected device will be off after the power supply is reconnected.
1 - Device memorizes its state after a power failure. Connected device will be set to the status from before power failure.

options.option: Do not remember state
Remember state before power failure

parameter.name: config_30_1
parameter.label: 30: Alarm of any type (General alarm, flood alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm.)
parameter.description:
Alarm of any type (General alarm, flood alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm.)
Default setting: INACTIVE

options.option: INACTIVE - the device doesn't respond to alarm frames
ALARM ON - the device turns on once alarm is detected (all channels set to 99%)
ALARM OFF - the device turns off once alarm is detected (all channels set to 0%)
ALARM PROGRAM - alarm sequence turns on (program selected in parameter 38)

parameter.name: config_38_1
parameter.label: 38: Alarm sequence program
parameter.description:
Alarm sequence program.
Default setting: 10
1-10 specifies alarm program number.

parameter.name: config_39_2
parameter.label: 39: Active PROGRAM alarm time
parameter.description:
IActive PROGRAM alarm time.
Default setting: 600s
1-65534 specifies alarm time in seconds.

parameter.name: config_42_1
parameter.label: 42: Command class reporting Outputs status change
parameter.description:
Command class reporting Outputs status change.
Default setting: 0

options.option: Reporting as a result of inputs and controllers actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result of inputs actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result of inputs actions (COLOR CONTROL)

parameter.name: config_43_1
parameter.label: 43: Reporting 0-10v analog inputs change threshold
parameter.description:
Parameter defines a value by which input voltage must change in order to be reported to the main controller.
New value is calculated based on last reported value.
Default setting: 5
1-100 - (0.1-10V).

parameter.name: config_44_2
parameter.label: 44: Power load reporting frequency
parameter.description:
Parameter defines Time between reports. The report will be sent if last reported value differs from the current value, else reports will also be sent in case of polling.
Default setting: 3 600 (s)
Available settings: 1 - 65534 (s)
Value of 0 - no periodic reports, reports will also be sent in case of polling.
Reports will be sent only in case of power load / energy consumption changes (parameters 40, 42, 43,45) or in case of polling.

parameter.name: config_45_1
parameter.label: 45: Reporting Changes in energy consumed by controlled devices
parameter.description:
Defines the required change in power to generate an unsolicited power report.
New, reported energy value is calculated based on last reported value.
\ Default setting: 10 (0,1 kWh).
Available settings: 1 - 254 (0,01kWh - 2,54kWh).
Value of 255 - changes in consumed energy will not be reported. Reports will be sent only in case of polling.
